an inability to feel pain: Patients were monitored for postoperative analgesia. It could not have been predicted that the substance would produce analgesia.
drugs that stop you from feeling pain: Addiction to analgesia is a common problem. We discussed why and how analgesia should be given in childbirth. Related word
